overview: Tantra is the ancient Indian doctrine of sexual and cosmic union between Shiva and Shakti, between husband and wife. This movie shows you a complete Tantric ritual using old traditions, beginning with the bathing ritual, a full body massage, the Yoni massage (Intimate massage of the woman), and ending sexual fusion in Maithuna. Experience a new dimension of sexuality and give your partner wellbeing, sensuality, and unbridled lust!
title: Tantra
